About Me

Aditya Anantharaman

I am a final year Undergraduate student currently pursuing my B.Tech in Information Technology at National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal. I am interested in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision and Data Mining.

Experience

Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad (IITH)

Working on Zero Shot Object Detection. Developed novel additions to Faster RCNN architecture to improve performance in zero shot setting.

Aug 2018 - Present
Project Assistant at Visual Learning and Intelligence (VIGIL) Lab

Microsoft R&D, Hyderabad

Worked in the Microsoft Azure Networking team and developed a Test Cluster management, monitoring and usage plug and play service. Built a UI dashboard for interacting and reporting alongside the service.

May 2018 - July 2018
Software Engineering Intern

Institute of Systems Studies and Analysis, DRDO

Worked on Frequent Itemset Mining using Eclat (Equivalent Class Transformation) algorithm for large certain and uncertain datasets. Extended the Eclat algorithm and developed FT-Eclat algorithm for Fault-Tolerant Frequent Itemset Mining.

May 2017 - July 2017
Summer Research Intern

My Projects

Paraphrase Detection using Deep Learning

Applied paraphrase detection to the medical domain of clinical prescriptions. Developed a Bidirectional RNN based model with multi perspective matching and Attention.

...   ...

Parallel k-means Clustering

Used k-means clustering for Image Colour Quantization and Image Compression. k-means clustering implemented in parallel on 3 platforms - OpenMP, CUDA and MPI with performance comparison.

...   ...

Android Malware Detection

Classification of android apps done based on pseudo-dynamic analysis of system API Call sequences. Developed a Deep Autoencoder model for feature compression along with a CNN and RNN model.

...   ...

LIBO - Android App

Smart Library management app which integrates Microsoft Azure database and Microsoft cognitive services (OCR) and also uses basic recommender systems with the help of the apriori algorithm.

...   ...

Deep Learning for conversational information agents

Developed a Game of thrones themed chatbot using recurrent neural networks. Chatbot classifies user interaction as either conversational or a knowledge-seeking query. Conversations are handled using a generative sequence-to-sequence model. A retrieval sequence-autoencoder model used for answering knowledge-seeking queries.

...   ...

ID3 Decision tree predictor

Implemented the Iterative Dichotomiser 3 decision tree algorithm. The motivation was to see how this traditional algorithm performed on modern large datasets. Discretization of features which take continuous values using K-means clustering improved the performance.

...   ...

Project Management Portal

Developed a project management portal for purchase departmant at NITK Surathkal for seamless management and querying of projects undertaken. Takes care of underlying bank work like financial statement, credit and debit heads and annual interest generation.

...   ...

Parallel Breadth First Search (BFS)

Implemented parallel breadth first search (BFS) using Hadoop Map Reduce. Used this algorithm to solve the single-source all pairs shortest path problem.

...   ...
